briefTitle: Melatonin Agonist Effects of Tasimelteon Versus Placebo in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
officialTitle: MAGELLAN: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Masked, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel Study to Investigate the Safety and Efficacy of 20 Mg Tasimelteon Versus Placebo in Adult Subjects With Major Depressive Disorder Followed by a 52-Week Open-Label Extension
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of an 8-week double-masked treatment of tasimelteon or placebo in male and female subjects with Major Depressive Disorder.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Endpoint at Week 8 Using the Total Score of the Hamilton Depression Rating Scale (HAM-D)
